main event: Four objects were sighted in May 1957, with three of them being the size of a pixel and one being 1/5 the size of a pixel. They displayed irregular light patterns before disappearing to the northwest.
interesting points: The sighting took place for about 10 to 30 seconds, A fourth object appeared 30 seconds after the initial three and disappeared to the north, The objects were reported as white, The conclusion of the investigation considered possibilities such as missile, balloon, aircraft, or astronomical phenomena, The visibility was clear with few low clouds in the area.
witness description: A captain who glanced up at the sky and saw the objects.
